item.title: 莉莉-格拉德斯通（Lily Gladstone）发现了获得 SAG 女主角奖的额外好处：后台二头肌卷曲。
item.description:
Lily Gladstone found a bonus benefit to winning the lead actress SAG Award: backstage bicep curls. pic.twitter.com/UiH7rwm4MG

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 25, 2024

item.title: 佩德罗-帕斯卡尔（Pedro Pascal）与科尔曼-多明戈（Colman Domingo）第一次见面是在近二十年前的一部莎士比亚戏剧中。现在，帕斯卡尔凭借《最后的我们》获得了 SAG 奖，而多明戈则凭借《拉斯廷》获得了奥斯卡提名。
item.description:
Pedro Pascal first met Colman Domingo in a Shakespeare play nearly two decades ago. Now Pascal is a SAG Award winner for "The Last of Us" and Domingo is Oscar-nominated for "Rustin." pic.twitter.com/6Xi8QBuXQh

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 25, 2024

item.title: 墨西哥总统之子和总统候选人谴责电话号码泄露，称收到威胁

item.title: 伊丽莎白-德比奇（Elizabeth Debicki）确实没想到自己会因《王冠》中戴安娜王妃的扮演者而获得 SAG 奖。她击败了莎拉-斯努克（Sarah Snook）和詹妮弗-安妮斯顿（Jennifer Aniston）等人，获得了电视剧女主角奖。
item.description:
Elizabeth Debicki really did not expect to win a SAG Award for playing Princess Diana in "The Crown." She beat out Sarah Snook and Jennifer Aniston, among others, for lead actress in a drama series. pic.twitter.com/tVGFMu3xzx

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 25, 2024

item.title: 达文-乔伊-兰多夫（Da'Vine Joy Randolph）在第 30 届美国演员工会奖（Screen Actors Guild Awards）上获得最佳女配角，巩固了她奥斯卡影后的地位。
item.description:
Da'Vine Joy Randolph won best supporting female actor at the 30th Screen Actors Guild Awards, solidifying her status as Oscar favorite.https://t.co/InsUpzD6Xz pic.twitter.com/SfJVt2n4IK

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 25, 2024

item.title: 汤姆和格雷格的罗马式合影：《接班人》主演基兰-卡尔金、尼古拉斯-布劳恩和马修-麦克法丁在 SAG 颁奖典礼上合影。
item.description:
A Roman photobomb for Tom and Greg: "Succession" stars Kieran Culkin, Nicholas Braun and Matthew Macfadyen unite at the SAG Awards. pic.twitter.com/9KyoHcrv2f

item.title: 嗨，芭比！玛格特-罗比（Margot Robbie）身着 Schiaparelli 走在 SAG Awards 银色地毯上，粉色面料蓬勃发展，引人注目。
item.description:
Hi Barbie! Margot Robbie walked the SAG Awards silver carpet in Schiaparelli with a dramatic pink fabric flourish. pic.twitter.com/SglTq9TGmv

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 25, 2024

item.title: 哈莉-贝利（Halle Bailey）说 "我感觉自己像个女人"，她回顾了母亲身份如何为她的歌曲创作打开了 "新的大门"。
item.description:
Halle Bailey says "I feel like a woman" as she reflects on how motherhood has opened a "new portal" for her songwriting. pic.twitter.com/pUu9el5lL4

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 25, 2024

item.title: 佩德罗-帕斯卡尔（Pedro Pascal）和科尔曼-多明戈（Colman Domingo）在《名利场》好莱坞版封面大片发布几天后，在美国演员工会奖（SAG Awards）的银色地毯上再次聚首。
item.description:
Pedro Pascal and Colman Domingo reunited on the SAG Awards silver carpet days after the release of their Vanity Fair Hollywood issue cover shoot. pic.twitter.com/blAoKUzNSl

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 25, 2024

item.title: 在 SAG 颁奖典礼上，SAG-AFTRA 主席 Fran Drescher 表示，在去年的演员罢工之后，"一切都会好起来的"。
item.description:
At the SAG Awards, SAG-AFTRA President Fran Drescher says "all's well that ends well" after last year's actors strike. pic.twitter.com/DTbCKIGkqo

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 25, 2024

item.title: 马克-杜普拉斯（Mark Duplass）说，去年震惊业界的罢工事件发生后，好莱坞许多人都感到 "日子不好过"。
item.description:
Mark Duplass says it’s “not an easy time” for many in Hollywood after last year’s industry-shaking strikes. pic.twitter.com/CZvaankJEk

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 25, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）的家乡击败了她，进一步逼近共和党候选人提名。
item.description:
BREAKING: Donald Trump has beaten Nikki Haley in her home state and is further closing in on GOP nomination. https://t.co/PRfcI1c54c

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 25, 2024
